snippet: The American women will face Australia, Sweden and Nigeria in the 2015 tournament, which will be played in Canada.
abstract: United States women's national soccer team will face Australia, Sweden and Nigeria in 2015 Women's World Cup soccer tournament, which will be played in Canada.
